notes: Modern, newly renovated apartment with excellent condition - features LED recessed lighting, split AC units, large flat-screen TV with built-in entertainment center, modern kitchen with stainless steel refrigerator and washer/dryer, and quality wood laminate flooring in bedroom. Very clean with open floor plan. For baby safety: no visible stairs or dangerous balconies, furniture has mostly rounded edges, but the low coffee tables and open kitchen area may need childproofing. Good natural light from windows with zebra blinds. Building has intercom system suggesting elevator access on 6th floor.
